attributes.action: Parliament to immediately scrap VAT on Domestic Gas and Electricity
attributes.additional_details:
The Leave Campaign have repeatedly cited that the UK would scrap VAT on domestic fuel bills from 5% to 0% if the UK were to vote to Leave the EU. 

Now that the UK has voted to Leave the EU, the U.K. Parliament must to scrap VAT on domestic fuel as the public have been assured during the EU Referendum.
attributes.background: The Leave Campaign have repeatedly cited that EU Rules prevent the UK Parliament  from scrapping VAT on domestic Gas and Electricity bills in the UK

rejection.details: The UK has not yet left the EU. You could start a new petition calling on the Government to do this as soon as the UK leaves the EU.
